snippet: The White House said President Obama “does intend to veto this legislation,” which drew the backing of lopsided majorities in both houses....
abstract: White House press secretary Josh Earnest says Pres Obama will veto legislation passed by Congress that would let families of victims of Sept 11, 2001, attacks sue Saudi Arabia for any role in plot.
lead_paragraph: The White House said President Obama “does intend to veto this legislation,” which drew the backing of lopsided majorities in both houses.

headline.main: Obama to Veto Bill Allowing 9/11 Lawsuits Against Saudi Arabia
headline.print_headline: Bill Allowing 9/11 Lawsuits Against Saudis Faces Veto
